Nerangs.ab: barsom sih ud sē tāg ud frāgām dō tāg barsom bastan ud parāhōm kardan sāzišn hamāg xūb frāz nihādan ud parāhōm kardan rāy pad har hōmāst-ē pad kamistīh hōm sē tāg ud urwarām pārag-ē ud ǰām andak-ē frāz nihišn

"The barsom (consists of) 33 twigs and the frāgām are two. He should tie the barsom, prepare the parāhōm and dispose all the implements carefully. For the preparation of the parāhōm, he has to dispose for each Hōmāst at least three twigs of hōm and a branch of urwarām and a drop of ǰām."
